column13: ç”»è›‡æ·»è¶³ (huÃ  shÃ© tiÄn zÃº) is a chengyu (idiom) that comes from a story about a drawing contest. column13: å®ˆæ ªå¾…å…” (shÇ’u zhÅ« dÃ i tÃ¹) is a chengyu (idiom) from a fable about a farmer who saw a hare accidentally run into a tree stump and die. He then abandoned his farm work and waited by the stump every day, hoping for another hare to do the same.
